comments.body:
Can you add a type assertion on `promiseManyArray.promise` to make sure it's a promise that resolves to an `ArrayProxy` and not an `Ember.Array`? e.g.
```ts
import ArrayProxy from '@ember/array/proxy';
â‹®
assertType<RSVP.Promise<ArrayProxy<DS.Model>>>(promiseManyArray.promise);
```
This will make sure we don't lose that now that we need to pass it in to `PromiseArray`.
